attributes.action: change the format of the certificate of marriage in England and Wales to fit an A4 piece of paper and include bride and groom's date of birth, not just their age, and include the occupation/profession of mother as well as father.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Photocopying/scanning certificates of marriage would be much easier if they were changed to A4 format as they are in Scotland and the civil marriage certificates.  Including the mother's profession/occupation would reflect 21st century society more accurately and including the date of birth would help geneologists of the future
